timeline.bodyText: There are several copyOf methods, so I prefer not to have static import for that.
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.bodyText: call this(...) that way there is one true constructor and several convenience constructors. Then move this constructor up, so they are ordered by usage (used lower).
timeline.author: kokosing

timeline.message:

Also add a defensive copy of constructor argument
